title: Mobile Technology-Integrated High School English Education Program: Enhancing Academic Achievement and Social Presence

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English communication skills and basic mobile device operation proficiency
context.additional_context: High school-linked English education program in vocational training institutions, integrating mobile learning via smartphones. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20% or greater improvement in academic performance in English writing, listening, and speaking by combining the Duolingo app with classroom activities.
Learners enhance the frequency (three or more times per week) and qualitative level of social interactions through mobile-based collaborative activities.
Learners establish and implement self-directed English learning strategies using digital tools (two or more hours per week).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
